abilityEffect.en: Once during your turn, when you play Quagsire from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may search your discard pile for up to 2 Pokémon Tool cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand.

effect.en: If Quagsire has a Pokémon Tool card attached to it, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage.
